articles.title: Two massive oxygen tanks been installed at the new Dragon's Heart hospital at the Principality Stadium - Wales Online
articles.description: The hospital will be welcoming the first patients in the coming days
articles.content:
Two large tanks of liquid oxygen tanks have been installed for the new Dragons Heart/Calon Y Ddraig hospital.
They were put in place on Saturday outside the Principality Stadium as part of its conversion into a 2,000-bed coronavirus field hospital.
